Summary: Saw large silent craft over house next to tweed nh
divs: Sighting Details I was sitting watching television.We just gotcable tv.The movie channel intro was starting then got fuzzy.We heard screamingand mom went to Front door window and said Dave a UFO! I got up and ran towindow and across the street saw a huge craft over neighbors trees. Could seewindows and inside craft but no people. Neighbors all came into middle ofstreet.Girls were screaming terrified. we huddled in fright. neighbor was sonervous hands tremored badly so he couldnt open front door to get camera. objectcame from Raynam hill went over airport then to Fort Nathan Hale.There were morewitneses there and 2 policeman reported it in the new haven register the nextday. not sure if it was westchester boomerang because outline of ship was sodark it was hard to tell shape but windows were clear as day. it was about 9pm
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in New Haven
There were no other sightings in New Haven on or around May 31st 1984
